description: A bare nominalization of the verb take down.

entries.meaning: (slang) A taking down: the arrest of a suspect by a police officer.
(martial arts) A taking down: an act of bringing one's opponent to the ground by grabbing one or both legs and applying a rearward bending moment.
Enforced removal of material from a website, etc.
examples: The DMCA also gives the targets of notice-and-takedown complaints a limited opportunity to have access to their materials restored.
